snippet.title: Crime Simulator | Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Add to Wishlist NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2737070/Crime_Simulator

Tired of barely living? No work in sight, let alone fun? Well, look no further. Become a criminal and make money in various ways - there's always a job waiting if you're willing to accept it.

Play up to 4 people, complete jobs, steal, fight, and take over hideouts in free-roam areas. Take on unique tasks with special requirements. Buy cars, craft new weapons and ammunition. Nothing can stop you anymore.

#crimesimulator #thiefsimulator2coop #coop
